questions.question: I think that success in life is more likely to depend on chance than on calculation
If I lose my favorite activity, life will lose all meaning for me
For me, in any business, the final result is more important than its execution
I believe that people suffer more from failures at work than from bad relationships with loved ones
In my opinion, most people live with distant goals, not close ones
I've had more success in my life than no success
I like emotional people more than active ones
Even in normal work, I try to improve some of its elements
Absorbed in thoughts of success, I can forget about precautions
My loved ones think I'm lazy
I think that my failures are more likely to be caused by circumstances than by myself
I have more patience than ability
My parents controlled me too much
Laziness, not doubt of success, often forces me to abandon my intentions
I think I'm a confident person
For the sake of success, I can take a risk even if Shang Seung is small
I'm a hardworking person
When everything goes smoothly, my energy increases
If I were a journalist, I would write more often about people's original inventions than about incidents
My loved ones usually don't share my plans
The level of my requirements for life is lower than that of my comrades
It seems to me that I have more perseverance than ability
